title: 貌似有个奇葩的bug
author: wangchujinqwe
txt_content:
为何信标可以穿过岩浆啊。。


同样试验了一下对多层信标同样有效果。。。

而水却无效
最诡异的是服务器居然也

莫非是我的客户端出问题了？。。。

replies.txt_content:

beacons are supposed to be hard to get (wither and stuff) and also POWERFUL.
But
if you insist its a bug, you can always pay a visit to here.
https://mojang.atlassian.net/
